arrayItem.property: The Tib Hawk Domain name determines the scope of management for eManager.

wizardBean.property: The eManager Web Server requires 9 unused ports. Please make sure that these ports are free and not being used by other Web servers:

E-Mail Configuration: With eManager you have the ability to (optionally) send an e-mail to one or people reporting the application status. An e-mail is sent out when the state of application processes changes after the application stabilizes.
